frontMatter.title: Area of Right Angle Triangle
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to find area of right angle triangle

contentHtml:
Write a program to compute the area of a right angle triangle

base  : 2
height : 3

area : 3
markdown:
## Write a program to compute the area of a right angle triangle

```txt
base  : 2
height : 3

area : 3
```

---
